data.text: @ViennaMusicEdu Hi, we are truly sorry that you haven't heard back from us. Please send us the booking code in a DM, so we can have a closer look at your booking's status. Kind regards, Sarah

@marionwestbroek Hello Marion,
you can check in the luggage at the self-service counter.
Have a pleasant flight.
Best regards, Alessandra

urls.title: Entry requirements
urls.description: Back in the air at last! More great travel destinations, more protection – and safety is always top priority for us. We are back in Europe and on long haul.

data.text:
@thorisom Hi Thoriso, thank you for getting in touch. For your journey, please follow the entry regulations of your final destination. You can find more information on our webpage. Please use the following link https://t.co/4Wcq6sBlam
Best regards, Shawn

@thomasocean1 Hi Thomas, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please contact our colleagues at the airport directly regarding any status updates on your flight. They will be happy to assist. Kind regards, Chris
@adamdheaton Hi Adam, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @chrissy_bullock Hi Christine, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/Ol8KOMXtt0 Kind regards, Chris

@KueblerB Hello Benjamin, 
I would like to sincerely apologize that the Online Check-in did not work.
Kindly send us your booking code, we'll try to help.
Best regards, Alessandra
@marionwestbroek Hi, we recommend checking in online wherever possible and following the advice on Schipol's website: https://t.co/w7vjqTVHCJ  Kind regards, Lyndsay
@FrankBlous Hi, please send us your booking code in a PM and we'll check for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@varun_nahata Hi Varun, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@Viscount57 Hi Richard, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Is there anything we can assist you with? If you are referring to an existing booking please send us the booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Chris
@alliroithinger Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay / Kind regards, Lyndsay
@rodoulad https://t.co/oKoVsjmXyK Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2]

data.text: @rodoulad Hi, we're sorry we couldn't cater for your dietary requirements. Special meals need to be requested at least 24 hours before departure so we can order them on time.Please fill in our complaint form regarding the wheelchair service and we will contact the relevant department [1/2]

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
urls.description: Even in these times, we bring you safely to your desired destination. Whether on the ground or in the air: we always pay attention to hygiene and your health.

data.text: @CdcTraffic Hi there, your check-in has been successfully completed. To get and print out your boarding passes please proceed one more time to the online check-in link on our homepage: https://t.co/Ek0E3uI92a  - best regards, Brigitte

@NVHGlobalLtd @AustrianDev Hi, please don't share your booking code publicly due to privacy reasons. Please write us a DM and delete your Tweet. Thank you!
Kind regards, Sarah

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@nvhgloballtd @austriandev Hello,
please send us your request to this link:
https://t.co/Z84disxlyn
Best regards, Alessandra
@Gabe_Meneses Hi, please don't share your booking code publicly due to privacy reasons. Please, write us a DM. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine
@ayayot Hi, you can also contact us via this e-mail address vielzos@austrian.com. Kind regards, Christine
@nfb27 Hi, then please send an e-mail to vielzos@austrian.com. Kind regards, Christine
@NadiehClarkson Hi, usually we recommend 2 or 3 hours prior to departure. Kind regards, Christine

@ayayot Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR Report. 
Kind regards,Christine
@nfb27 Hi Naheed, then please just add your baggage number instead. Kind regards, Christine

@cameronbenoit10 [2]  Please proceed to our webpage and fill-up the form via this link https://t.co/qIsGzJyC3U 
Best regards, Shawn

@cameronbenoit10 [1] Hi Cameron, we apologize for the delay with your luggage. We are sorry that you had difficulty contacting us by phone. Due to the current situation, unfortunately, all our channels are overloaded and there may be longer waiting times.

@NadiehClarkson Hi Nadieh, the earlier the better to avoid missing your flight. As you mentioned already, especially on peak days we advise planning a time buffer, as security control can sometimes take a little more time. We wish you a pleasant trip. Best regards, Brigitte

@nfb27 Hi Naheed, we are sorry for not being able to deliver your baggage on time. I kindly have to ask you to file a claim on our webpage via the following link https://t.co/KIMN0tJ0Dk 
Best regards, Shawn

@homeroomtravel Hi Francesca, thank you for reaching out. KN95 masks without a valve can be used as an alternative to the FFP2 mask which is usually asked to use on board Austrian flights. Kind regards, Derya
@tbahs Hi Antonio, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@nek0_85 Hi Neko, sorry for the inconvenience. I kindly have to ask you to contact my colleagues at the airport, since they will be able to take a closer look at this matter. 
Best regards, Shawn

@thomasfraiss Hi Thomas, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten mit deinen eJournals hattest. Bitte sende deine Anfrage über folgendes Formular https://t.co/WpVSaEeasA damit sie an die zuständigen KollegInnen weitergeleitet werden kann. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@RomainLabaye Hi Romain, thank you for reaching out. Please get in touch with our colleagues at specialcases@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @PriyaN52805241 @HeathrowAirport Hi Priya,I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered.Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport.The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards,Christine
@shiva_bull @ftyl Hi, yes please send us a DM. https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@shiva_bull @ftyl Hi, how can we assist you? Please send us a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@laetitiaharper Hi Laetitia, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@susan_mckee Hi Susan, we are really sorry about your luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@steamingdonut Hi Julie, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Hilfe & Kontakt
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen rund um Ihre Reservierungen, Ihren Flug oder Ihr Gepäck? Kontaktieren Sie uns über unser Kontaktformular.Wir helfen Ihnen gerne weiter.

data.text: @connaissir Hi, es tut uns leid, dass es auf deiner Reise zu Unannehmlichkeiten für dich gekommen ist. Solltest du deinen Fall noch nicht an unser Feedback Management geschickt haben, bitte mach das unter folgendem Link: https://t.co/M3WLkUPn4R Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@Rise_XQ Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly have a look at this matter. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@shay_monet2 Hi Cheyenne, we are sorry that you had difficulty contacting us by phone. Due to the current situation, unfortunately, all our channels are overloaded and there may be longer waiting times. How can we assist you? Best regards, Shawn
@hmsq82 Hi Hugo, thank you for getting in touch. Would you mind sending us your booking code via PM, so we can assist you further? Best regards, Shawn

@dadolissimo Apologies for the issues you've had, Davide. If you need any assistance, please DM us and we can try to help. 
 Best regards, Alessandra
@makigemischt Hi Markus, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris
@steamingdonut Hi Julie, but please mind that the minimum connecting time for Vienna airport is only 25 minutes. Kind regards, Christine

data.text:
Austrian goes Hollywood 🎥 
Today we're kicking off the resumption of non-stop flights to Los Angeles 🇺🇸 Austrian Airlines ✈️ will link #Vienna with the City of Angels up to 6 times a week. 
👉🏼 https://t.co/YLEBDoRZ3z 
#ServusLosAngeles https://t.co/R0LGpRP4Pb
@DusanHorvath Hi, please send us your travel details (booking code) in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine

@smchico Hi there, our colleagues are still confronted with a huge number of calls which makes it difficult to take your call sooner. You can also send us your inquiry in a DM. We'll be happy to assist you further. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6SOY0

urls.title: Economy Class fares
urls.description: Economy Light, Classic or Flex? Find out more about the three fares and select the most appropriate one for your upcoming trip.

data.text: @aniagabb Hi Ania, thank you for choosing Austrian Airlines. For your request I kindly ask you to proceed to our webpage via this link https://t.co/JtfgOfUOEq - Here you will find further details about any luggage allowance depending on your ticket. Best regards, Shawn

@Patrici28033272 Hi Patricia, please mind that we -from the social media team- are not able to assist you, unfortunately. Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.
Kind regards,Christine
@loppas6972 Hi Nicola, please contact the respective authorities to get the needed information. I am sorry that we cannot assist you in this matter. Kind regards, Christine

data.text:
@epa_nit Hallo Pana,
vielen Dank für dein Feedback. 
Solltest du deinen Fall noch nicht an unser Feedback Management geschickt haben, bitte mach das unter folgendem Link: https://t.co/vmBr0ynoFt
 Viele Grüße,Alessandra
@thedapperdon1k [2/2]  In order to assist you further, please send us your booking code via PM. Best regards, Shawn

@thedapperdon1k [1/2] Hi there, we apologize for the flight irregularity and we are sorry that you had difficulties contacting us by phone. Due to the current situation, unfortunately, all our channels are overloaded and there are longer waiting times.
@irina_scurtu Hi Irina, sorry for the inconvenience. in order to assist you further, please provide us with your booking reservation via PM. Best regards, Shawn

@Patrici28033272 Hi Patricia, we can’t offer an immediate solution in this case, unfortunately, as we have no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards, Christiane

@patrici28033272 Hi Patricia, sorry about the inconvenience during your trip. In order to get further assistance regarding your luggage, please proceed to our webpage https://t.co/KIMN0tJ0Dk
and fill-up the form. My colleagues will happily assist you. Best regards, Shawn

data.text: @Matieeuh Hi Mat, please don't share your flight details or any other information about your booking publicly due to privacy reasons. Please write us a DM in order to assist you. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine
@awerlin Hi Andrea, we regret to read that you are not able to reach us. We can only advise you to try it again a bit later. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine
@awerlin Hi, did you also try these numbers +1 800843 0002 or +43 1 70148 1000? Kind regards, Christine
@Matieeuh Hi Mat, please send us more details. Flightnumber, destinatioin, date and your name. We will have a closer look. Kind regards, Funda
@hariseldon2 Hi Hari, please check your case number and sent it to us via a DM. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine
@CdcTraffic Hi, but as already mentioned, in case you are traveling in Business Class no fast track pass is needed. Kind regards, Christine
@DRussoInnovate Hi Daniella,  we are sorry you're having trouble getting through. It may help to call between 8 and 9 am when it tends to be less busy. Kind regards, Christine
@themattmendonca Hi Matt, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties. How exactly can we assist you? Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Airline eligibility | Heathrow
urls.description: Find out which airlines offer our Fast Track service

data.text: @cdctraffic Hi there, please click on the following link to inform yourself about the fast track lane at LHR Airport https://t.co/6hCSBjYZtI. Kind regards, Derya
@hariseldon2 Hi Hari, did you already fill out the mentioned online form? Kind regards, Chris
@CdcTraffic Hi, if there is an extra entrance to a security check for business class of course you can use it. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Magic_Sebko Hi there, in this case, you can only book the tickets via our Callcenter directly. Please find our worldwide phone numbers here: https://t.co/6bcy4DjBko Best regards, Christiane

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @hariseldon2 [3/3] In order to submit a claim please use the following link https://t.co/fdNkMAHZ6N. Our colleagues will have a closer look at your case and will come back to you as soon as possible. Kind regards, Derya

@hariseldon2 [2/3] Austrian Airlines is taking over responsibility for the delay of the baggage according to international regulations which say that 50% of the costs you had to spend on clothes and 100% of costs you had to spend on cosmetics and underwear will be reimbursed.
@hariseldon2 [1/3] Hi Hari, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@youcouldtravel Hi there thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya
@AnnaKrekova Hi Anna, thank you for reaching out. Please send an email to our colleagues at specialcases@austrian.com. They will assist you with your request. Kind regards, Derya
@Magic_Sebko Hi Sebastien thank you for reaching out. Please send us the booking codes for both in a DM. We´ll kindly take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@CdcTraffic Hi, access allowance is encoded into your boarding card, nothing separate is needed. So if you're traveling business class, you can use the security fast track. Best regards, Christiane

@jonnypett Hi Jon, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you have not been able to rebook your ticket in the meantime please send us the booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @cschelblahblah Hi there, Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/CYbLamOUFH Kind regards, Chris
@VincentKeunen @badservice_be Apologies for the issues you've had, Vincent. If you need any assistance, please DM us and we can try to help. Best regards, Alessandra

@Bets1363 Hi Betsy, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage and can only ask you once again to contact our responsible colleagues. We kindly ask for your understanding.  Kind regards, Chris

@bets1363 Hi Betsy, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR – you’ve received the Passenger Irregularity Report at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. 
Kind regards, Christine
@Frizzante Hi C🇪🇺SS🇪🇺, das tut uns leid, dass du Probleme hattest. Vielleicht helfen dir die Informationen auf unserer Homepage weiter https://t.co/dUKuZ9PaZb. Liebe Grüße, Christine

@rgxdani Hi, we currently have a lot of calls again. I can assure you that we are in full commitment for you and we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again.Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @giselagiotto [3/3] Unsere KollegInnen prüfen diesen Vorfall genauer und prüfen eine mögliche Kompensation. Wir hoffen, dass eure nächsten Reisen wieder planmäßig verlaufen. Liebe Grüße, James

@giselagiotto [1/3] Hi Gisela, deine Kritik an der Überbuchung von Flügen ist berechtigt. Es ist jedoch bestimmt nicht unsere Absicht, Passagiere mit dieser Vorgehensweise zu verärgern. Überbuchungen sind ein Instrument, das in der Airline Branche

@giselagiotto [2/3] flächendeckend zum Einsatz kommt. Wir sind bestrebt, eine möglichst hohe Auslastung unserer Flüge zu erzielen. Es tut uns leid, falls ihr davon betroffen seid. Wir bitten dich das folgende Kontaktformular https://t.co/vVdWJ3mqIF auszufüllen

data.text: @docscarabus @lufthansa Hi, sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please tell us her booking code in a DM and kindly advise how we can assist. Brgds, James

@larrykluger Hi, you can also contact our ticketing desk at Vienna Airport, located in Terminal 3. Our respective colleagues are glad to further assist you. You can also tell us your booking code in a DM and we'll try to help. Kind regards, James
@Subhro28496506 Hi there, For detailed information on the currently valid entry and transit regulations, please contact the responsible authorities or the embassy directly.  Kind regards, Chris
@Tagwa39261339 Hi, whilst many people prefer to reserve seats you do not have to. You can choose your seats online once check-in opens. Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text: @cdctraffic @heathrowairport Hi, we do not provide any fast-track pass. Kind regards, Christine

@amber_riedl Hi Amber, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again.
I can assure you that we are in full commitment for you and we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again. Kind regards, Christine

@subhro28496506 Hi, Austrian Airlines comply with the entry regulations specified by the respective national authorities. Please contact the respective Austrian authorities regarding the current transit regulations. Kind regards, Lyndsay
